articles.author: Jez Hemming
articles.title: North Wales health board reveals forecast for coronavirus peak - and it's still weeks away - North Wales Live
articles.description: Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board says the peak is expected in the middle of May
articles.content:
North Wales' coronavirus peak is expected to be in the middle of May, according to the region's health board.
The forecast by Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board was released in the minutes from a remote video meeting which took place on April 15.
